name: https://github.com/rafaelmnatali/k8s-gcp/projects
shortDescription: This tutorial intends to demonstrate how one can use Infrastructure as Code (IaC) to automate the provision and management of a Kubernetes cluster running on GCP.
longDescription: This tutorial intends to demonstrate how one can use Infrastructure as Code (IaC) to automate the provision and management of a Kubernetes cluster running on GCP.
